name: Beat 'n' Repair
description:
Beat 'n' Repair

Welcome to the world of tomorrow. A place where over consumption of crafted technological goods has come to a stop. You are a lonely crafter who loves to repair old mechanical and technological stuff by watching videos on internet. You’ll watch a series of hits and punchs in rythm that you’ll have to repeat in order to fix the things you’ve to repair. The more hits you achieve, the more you will fix the object.


Controls

             [ S ] -> Left Slap                           Right Slap <- [ H ]

[ Z ] -> Left Punch                                            Right Punch <- [ N ]
